# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity generation structure at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of the following entity:
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport structure at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, burner inserters, and boilers have fuel before use.
### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to operate.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to operate.
### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are filled with fluids.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
